opening_theme: #1: "Kaze Sagashi (風さがし)" by Natsumi Kiyoura (eps 01-11, 13)
#2: "Natsu no Kioku (夏の記憶)" by Natsumi Kiyoura (ep 12)
ending_theme: #1: "Sketchbook o Motta mama (スケッチブックを持ったまま)" by Yui Makino (eps 01-12)
#2: "Tanpopo Suisha （たんぽぽ水車）" by Asuka Nakase, Kana Hanazawa, and Yui Makino (ep 13)
